title: New Guidelines for Diabetes Management in Southeast Asia
summary: Updated recommendations for HbA1c targets and medication protocols specific to Filipino patients, considering genetic factors and lifestyle patterns.

title: AI-Assisted Medical Screening Shows Promise in Rural Healthcare
summary: Recent study demonstrates 87% accuracy in preliminary health assessments using AI tools similar to GalPal, particularly effective in remote areas.

title: Telemedicine Adoption Accelerates in Philippines
summary: DOH reports 300% increase in telemedicine consultations since 2023, with improved patient outcomes in chronic disease management.

title: Home Testing Accuracy Validation Study
summary: Comparative study shows home glucose and cholesterol testing devices achieve 95%+ correlation with laboratory results when used correctly.

title: Updated Cholesterol Guidelines Emphasize Prevention
summary: New international guidelines lower LDL targets for high-risk patients and emphasize lifestyle interventions for primary prevention.
